title: Problems With Champions READ!!!!
body:
1. Riot does do the game stupid.
2. They Only Change Champion that are already strong....
3. Yorick,Urgot,Galio are Champions that 10% of league og legends Players Play , they are so bad that nobady wants to buy/Play with them 
4. UPDATE YORICK URGOT AND GALIO for a better world of league of legends
5. FIORA TOO

replies.body: Urgot isnt bad... he is just.... ugly...

Please go to the English Forum, you're in the German. :)

regards Ashuna {{champion:1}}
Deutsches Forum, deutsche Sprache. Write it again, Sam. :-)
